daily_activities: Sightseeing: Visit the Grand Friday Mosque in Malé
Shopping: Explore the local markets in Malé for souvenirs and handicrafts
Adventure Sports: Snorkeling and diving in the crystal-clear waters of the Maldives
Dining: Enjoy a seafood lunch at a beachside restaurant
Hiking: Take a guided hike to the top of Villingili Island for panoramic views
Nightlife: Experience the vibrant nightlife of Malé with a visit to a rooftop bar
Museums: Visit the National Museum of Maldives to learn about the island's history and culture
Sightseeing: Explore the beautiful beaches and coral reefs of Hulhumalé Island
Adventure Sports: Go paddleboarding or kayaking in the calm waters of the Maldives
Dining: Enjoy a sunset dinner cruise with breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean
Shopping: Take a day trip to the nearby island of Thulusdhoo for surfing and shopping
Nightlife: Enjoy live music and cocktails at a beachside bar
Sightseeing: Take a ferry to the island of Guraidhoo for a relaxing day of beachcombing and swimming
Dining: Farewell dinner at a luxurious resort with stunning ocean views

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: Approximately 2 hours and 30 minutes to 3 hours
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to Malé International Airport (MLE) in Maldives, likely with a layover in a city like Mumbai or Delhi.
